Name: Digital Art and Design Association
Description: Faculty Advisor for the Digital Art and Design Association student organization, providing guidance and support for student activities and professional development.

Name: ACM SIGGRAPH LSU Student Chapter
Description: Faculty involvement with the ACM SIGGRAPH LSU Student Chapter, supporting student engagement with professional computer graphics and interactive techniques community.

Name: Black Artist Initiative
Description: Faculty Advisor for the Black Artist Initiative, mentoring students and supporting diversity and inclusion in the arts through programming and community building.
